education.degree: BACHELOR OF BUSINESS ADMINISTRATION IN BUSINESS MANAGEMENT

experiences.details:
Provide administrative and operational support for management team. Anticipate business needs and availability to develop work schedules. Authorize escalated customer issues using an internal support system.
- Analyze data to identify potential business opportunities and enhance workflow. - Increase satisfaction by resolving escalated customer service and support issues. - Collaborated with management to create a mentoring process to help team members improve their KPI’s. - Implemented trainings to standardize team’s knowledge and maintain KPIs. - Managed and distributed daily operations tasks amongst team while ensuring workload was leveled evenly and SLAs were met. - Managed queue levels during peak hours for Miami Greenlight Hub, partnering with on-shift agents to delegate incoming customers.

Managed a team, ensuring all daily tasks were met. Maximized productivity by promoting synergy and implementing policies to streamline workflow. Conducted market analysis to accurately plan inventory and estimate turnaround. Monitored all deliveries, providing assistance with transaction completion as needed.
- Boosted sales by cross-promoting products and services based on the buyer’s needs. - Maintained a strong working knowledge of inventory, insurance, and financing options. - Delivered high-quality results by focusing on management and team training.
